text: aur wahi hai jis ne asmaano aur zameen ko bar-haq paida kiya aur jis waqth Allah taâ€™ala itna keh dega tu hoja, wo ho padega, us ka kehna haq aur ba-asar hai aur saari hukumath qaas osi ki hogi jab ke soor mein phook maari jayegi, wo jaanne waala hai poshida chizo ka aur zaaher chizo ka aur wahi hai badi hikmath waala puri qabar rakhne waala
